named-query.name: READ_ACTIVE_ADDRESSES_BY_PERSON_ID
named-query.query: SELECT address FROM com.mpower.domain.Address address WHERE address.person.id = :personId AND address.inactive = FALSE ORDER BY address.activationStatus, address.createDate

named-query.name: READ_ACTIVE_ADDRESSES_BY_PERSON_ID_ORDER_BY_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT address FROM com.mpower.domain.Address address WHERE address.person.id = :personId AND address.inactive = FALSE ORDER BY address.addressType, address.activationStatus
